author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were killed on the spot when a lorry knocked down their motorcycle on Palani-Udumalpet Highway near Shanmuganadhi river bridge on Wednesday.

The deceased were identified as Sakthivel (25) and Varadharajan (23) of Akkamanaickanpudhur near Palani. The bodies were sent to Palani Government Hospital for post-mortem. While they were approaching a curve near the bridge, a lorry which was coming in the opposite direction knocked them down.
title: Two killed
